critique: The executive order pertains to suspending the abolishment of two customs ports of entry. It does not contain any information which allows assessment along the dimensions of political bias and sentiment:  # Ideological Tilt (Liberal vs. Conservative), # Immigration Approach (Closed vs. Open Borders), # Executive Power (Restriction vs. Expansion), # Federalism (State vs. Federal Primacy), # Security vs. Liberty (National Security vs. Civil Liberties), # Economic Regulation (Deregulation vs. Intervention), # Social Inclusion (Conformity vs. Diversity)
